title: Ferraro's Bar e Ristorante - Four Seasons Resort
typeOfFood: Vegan-friendly, Italian, Raw, Beer/Wine, Fusion, Non-veg
description: Serves meat, veg options available. Restaurant at the Four Seasons Resort offering a "wellness menu" that is vegan and gluten-free except for fish. Oceanfront dining, cuisine is Italian. Dishes are varied and include a raw beet ravioli, Indian coconut curry, quinoa mushroom cakes, and raw cheesecake.
